events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and want to request a refund as soon as possible.
The issue has been identified as a refund request due to incorrect product delivery.
Support agent Sarah has been assigned to handle this refund case for the customer.
Hello! I'm Sarah from support. I understand you want a refund for the wrong item you received.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received to help us process your refund?
Sure, my order number is 12345678 and I have attached a photo showing the incorrect product that arrived.
Thank you for the details. We will process your refund immediately and you should see the amount credited within 5 business days.
Thanks for the quick response! I appreciate your help with the refund and look forward to the confirmation.
Your refund has been processed successfully. Please check your account within the next few days for confirmation.
We are just checking in to confirm you have received your refund and if you need any further assistance.
Yes, I have received my refund. Thanks again for the excellent service and quick handling of my case.
We are glad to hear the refund was received. Closing your case now. Feel free to contact us anytime.
